summary.note: 15 benchmarks with error data (11 micro + 4 polybench). OoO dispatch reverted per issue #216 — pre-OoO baseline (d2c3373) achieves polybench avg 26.68% (<70% target met). Micro from CI run 22134036996 (commit 8554378). PolyBench atax/bicg/jacobi-1d from CI run 22134446555 (pre-OoO code). GEMM 0.301 from older pre-OoO run 22115496325 (ci_verified=false, no fresh CI on reverted code yet; run 22135618234 Group 2 still in_progress but tests OoO commit 15b79ed). MVT/2mm/3mm infeasible. Error formula: |sim-hw|/min(sim,hw).

benchmarks.name: gemm
benchmarks.note: Value from pre-OoO code (run 22115496325). OoO dispatch reverted per issue #216 — code now matches pre-OoO baseline (d2c3373). GEMM CI run 22135618234 Group 2 still in_progress but runs OoO code (commit 15b79ed), not applicable to reverted state. No fresh CI on reverted code yet.

benchmarks.name: aha_mont64
benchmarks.note: No hardware CPI workflow exists for EmBench; sim CPI only

infeasible.name: mvt
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit. Retired 26,249,968,103 instructions in 5B cycles (8736.82s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.190.

infeasible.name: 2mm
infeasible.reason: CI timeout after 55m on PolyBench accuracy workflow.

infeasible.name: 3mm
infeasible.reason: CI timeout after 55m on PolyBench accuracy workflow.

infeasible.name: crc32
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 12,499,991,230 instructions in 5B cycles (44m29s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.400.

infeasible.name: edn
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 13,000,000,936 instructions in 5B cycles (45m10s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.385.

infeasible.name: statemate
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 9,210,526,236 instructions in 5B cycles (35m17s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.543.

infeasible.name: primecount
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1, SZ=3, NPRIMES=9 (already maximally reduced). Retired 9,999,999,968 instructions in 5B cycles (42m49s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.500.

infeasible.name: huffbench
infeasible.reason: CI timeout after 2h30m wall-time; test killed before reaching 5B cycle limit.

infeasible.name: matmult-int
infeasible.reason: CI timeout; never started due to huffbench consuming full job allocation; expected to exceed 5B cycles based on compute intensity.
